mapper.select: select pid, pname, psinger, palbum, psong_address, pimg_address from play_recoreds where order by ssid
mapper.insert: insert into play_recoreds(pname, psinger, palbum, psong_address, pimg_address) values (#{pname},#{psinger},#{palbum},#{psongAddress},#{pimgAddress})
mapper.update: update play_recoreds set pname = #{pname}, psinger = #{psinger}, palbum = #{palbum}, psong_address = #{psongAddress}, pimg_address = #{pimgAddress} where pid = #{id}
